title: Must set dangerously_allow_filesystem to True if you want to use file paths
content:
@traceable(dangerously_allow_filesystem=True)
def trace_with_attachments(
    val: int,
    text: str,
    image: Attachment,
    audio: Attachment,
    video: Attachment,
    pdf: Attachment,
    csv: Attachment,
):
    return f"Processed: {val}, {text}, {len(image.data)}, {len(audio.data)}, {len(video.data)}, {len(pdf.data), {len(csv.data)}}"
